borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Variation to wording of condition 19 (hours of use) of planning permission ref: 2024/01525/VAR granted 2nd September 2024 for the 'Variation to the wording of Condition 19 (hours of use) of planning permission reference: 2006/03132/FUL dated 19th July 2007 for the "Use of basement and ground floor of 45 Parsons Green Lane for bar/restaurant purposes, in connection with the existing public house premises next door at 47 Parsons Green Lane; installation of external fume extraction ducting on the rear elevation of 45 Parsons Green Lane; conversion of the upper floors of 45 and 47 Parsons Green Lane to use as 5 non-self-contained residential units (first floor) and 2 self-contained flats (second floor); erection of two single storey rear extensions; installation of 2 rooflights in the roof slope of the existing two-storey outbuilding; related alterations to the Parsons Green Lane and Novello Street elevations of the properties', to read as follows: 'No customers shall be on the premises in connection with the bar/restaurant use hereby approved between 19:00 hours and 08:00 hours the following day' to allow the wording of condition 19 to read as follows: 'No customers shall be on the premises in connection with the bar/restaurant use hereby approved between 19:00 hours and 07:00 hours the following day'.
